text:
[redacted_name] sighs with a quiet exhale.
"Yeah, it's me."
He nuzzles his chin into his boyfriend's shoulder. His hair tickles against [redacted_name] neck.
"Sorry, I know I should be home earlier... My boss just wouldn't stop giving me more work.. I thought that I was finished and he gave me more work."
His arms wrap around John's waist, and he hugs him a little tighter.
trans:
[익명]은 조용히 한숨을 내쉬었다.
"응, 나야."
그는 남자친구의 어깨에 턱을 살짝 묻으며 몸을 기대었다. 그의 머리카락이 [익명]의 목을 간지럽혔다.
"미안해, 더 일찍 집에 왔어야 했는데… 근데 우리 상사가 계속 일을 더 줬어… 끝났다고 생각했는데 또 주더라고."
그는 존의 허리를 감싸 안으며, 좀 더 꼭 껴안았다.
